it.polimi.se2019.client.view

Class View

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.commons.utility.Observable<Event>
      • it.polimi.se2019.client.view.View
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventDispatcher, MVEventDispatcher, Observer<MVEvent>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ViewCLI, ViewGUI

    public abstract class View
extends Observable<Event>
implements Observer<MVEvent>, MVEventDispatcher
    User interface manager, is to be extended for adopting different UIs

    • Method Detail

      • matchMaking

        public abstract void matchMaking(List<String> usernames,
                                 List<String> configs)
        View initialization method that informs the user about the start of the matchmaking
        Parameters:
        usernames - usernames of all players in matchmaking
        configs - maps to show the user

      • addPlayer

        public abstract void addPlayer(String username,
                               int missingPlayers)
        Method for adding a player to matchMaking
        Parameters:
        username - username of the player to be added
        missingPlayers - players missing to begin the closing phase for matchMaking (e.g. timer)
